1.name: L'Inferno
1.description: Loosely adapted from Dante's Divine Comedy and inspired by the illustrations of Gustav Doré the original silent film has been restored and has a new score by Tangerine Dream.

7.description: This is the oldest found dramatic film from Serbia made in 1911. "Karadjordje" is a biography of a famed leader of a rebellion against the Turkish empire in 1804. We can see his whole life ...                See full summary »

8.name: Însir'te margarite
8.description: Composed of scenes meant to be projected in the intermissions of a play displayed at the National Theatre of Bucharest.

9.name: Die Verräterin
9.description: A woman betrays the regiment location in which the officer she is interested in is assigned because he despises her, only to regret it when he is caught and try to free him.

11.name: Anna Karenina
11.description: Countess Anna Karenina is torn between her lover Vronsky, and her husband, Count Karenin. Anna's love to Vronsky causes her much pain and social pressure. Her passion to Vronsky drives Anna...                See full summary »

15.name: Den hvide Slavehandels sidste Offer
15.description: Young white girls who were kidnapped and held captive and in imminent danger of being sexually molested. And the moor slaveholder will incorporate the poor girls in his harem.

16.name: The Colleen Bawn
16.description: Story about an Irishman from an impoverished family, who can marry either a rich woman and thus save the family estate or his poor true love.

18.name: Hamlet
18.description: Hamlet suspects his uncle has murdered his father to claim the throne of Denmark and the hand of Hamlet's mother, but the prince cannot decide whether or not he should take vengeance.

19.name: As in a Looking Glass
19.description: A father's drinking leads him to neglect his family. His young son emulates his father's actions when playing with his friends. The father sees his vices reflected in the child's play and resolves to change his ways.

20.name: Dzieje grzechu
20.description: The teenage girl is first seen confessing and warned about having any impure thoughts or feelings. Her family has boarders and one day a young man moves in and they fall in love.

23.name: The Life of Rufus Dawes

25.name: De bannelingen
25.description: Russia: A group of 19th century nihilists wants to change the system in czaristic Russia. They point out that conditions for prisoners are horrendous.

26.name: Der fremde Vogel
26.description: Vacationing in Germany, May falls for boatman Max. Her father disapproves and during a night of romance between the young couple Max drowns.

43.name: The Mystery of a Hansom Cab

45.name: L'électrocuté
45.description: The body of a cook is brought to life by an electrician through the use of electrodes.
